title: Absolute Batman
synopsis: In a Gotham without a Batman, a young Bruce Wayne must rise from the ashes of tragedy to become something new. Written by Scott Snyder with art by Nick Dragotta, Absolute Batman #14 delivers a bold, brutal reimagining of the Dark Knight.

title: Absolute Wonder Woman
synopsis: Diana of Themyscira faces her greatest challenge yet as the gods turn against humanity. Kelly Thompson and Hayden Sherman craft a mythic, action-packed epic in Absolute Wonder Woman #14.

title: Absolute Superman
synopsis: A powerless Clark Kent discovers the true meaning of hope in a world that fears him. Jason Aaron and Rafa Sandoval redefine the Man of Steel in Absolute Superman #14.

title: Absolute Martian Manhunter
synopsis: J'onn J'onzz confronts the ghosts of Mars and Earth in a psychological thriller that blurs the line between hero and monster.

title: Absolute Flash
synopsis: Barry Allen races against time itself to prevent a Speed Force collapse that could erase reality.

title: Absolute Green Lantern
synopsis: John Stewart wields the ultimate weapon of will in a universe where fear has become a physical force.
